data.title: Great find!
data.text: An impromptu visit to urgent Care before breakfast brought us to find this gem. Mom's breakfast panini, beefy burrito and egg sandwich were well worth the wait! Fresh bread, great seasonings enjoyed every morsel!

data.title: A great stopover for lunch
data.text: I stopped here as I was passing through Flagstaff and the food was tasty and a great value (the club sandwich was huge!). Staff were friendly and the outdoor seating area nice, with lots of people enjoying each other's company over a meal.

data.title: Great spot to eat nd you can bring the dogs.
data.text: Got a chicken ceasar wrap and a Ruben. Best Ruben ever and wife loves the wrap. Small business with outside dining. Great little find.

data.title: Love the Jersey Girl
data.text: Really love their Jersey Girl sandwich, (and add oil and vinegar from the New Yorker sandwich), its the best sandwich ever!  Try this place, you won't go wrong for a great sub sandwich.  My husband loves the Cuban, and we both love grandmas recipe dill potato salad.  Give it a try!!

owner_response.author: JennKurz, Owner at Aspen Deli, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Missilla,

Thank you so much for taking the time to review our shop!  We appreciate you and your business and look forward to serving you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Sandwiches on the go
data.text: We were homeward bound LA county. Needed something very for the long way home. We got 2 roast beef sandwiches. It was average nothing like busy bee in San Pedro! Nothing compares to hometown delies. When forced to resort to trying new deli's it's sad. Just ok!

owner_response.author: JennKurz, Owner at Aspen Deli, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hello!  I am sorry you did not enjoy your sandwiches more.  Though we pride ourselves on fresh produce, and clean label (no added ingredients) top quality meats there can always be that flavor that you are hoping to match that doesn't add up to that favorite restaurant back home.  We are sorry you were disappointed but hope to sometime get another chance to give you a better experience.  Maybe if you come back, try the Reuben!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Amazing fresh deli sandwich
data.text: Came to town for a few hours to check out the shops and found this place with a great location. We received perfect friendly service. We had our dog with us and sat outside on the clean patio. I had the "jersey girl" and my mom had the "turkey salad" both were so fresh and delicious. Wish I had an Aspen Deli in my home town!

owner_response.author: JennKurz, Owner at Aspen Deli, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Cassidy,

Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our little shop.  We are so happy you enjoyed your meal and hope to have the opportunity to serve you again the next time you are in town!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: As sandwich shops go, this one is pretty good.
data.text:
Having spent a couple days in downtown Flagstaff, my goal was to check a variety of eateries and brew pubs to which I would return on future visits. Having been a bit disappointed by my sandwich at a hipper-looking outdoor-patio cafe (The Toasted Owl Cafe, nearby), I thought I would stop in at the Aspen Deli, a very unassuming sandwich shop on a side street right downtown.  This time, I was not disappointed.

My sandwich was loaded with fresh fixins' between equally fresh slices of bread.

The Aspen Deli is small, but with a simple and inviting patio from which you can see the passing trains and tourists.  The service was quick and friendly.

If you're looking for some good, reasonably priced deli sandwiches downtown I would recommend this shop.

owner_response.author: JennKurz, Owner at Aspen Deli, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to review our shop!  We are happy you enjoyed your sandwich and hope to have the chance to service you again the next time you visit our little mountain town.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent Sandwiches
data.text: We stopped for lunch recently. I had the Reuben and my wife had the Club Sandwich. Both were excellent and reasonably priced. Limited seating in the restaurant so we ate outside.  Will definitely return and try some of the other sandwich options.  I believe this is the best sandwich restaurant in downtown Flagstaff.

owner_response.author: JennKurz, Owner at Aspen Deli, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to review our shop!  We are happy that you enjoyed the Reuben and club sandwiches.  They are both a couple of my favorites!  We look forward to serving you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Grab some big sandwiches to take to the Canyon.
data.text: We bought a couple of overstuffed sandwiches with chips and pickle.  Threw them in a cooler and got a lunch and a breakfast at the 4 AM sunrise alarm.  Parking is not a problem.  Just turn left after the intersection on Beaver. Several free spaces.

owner_response.author: JennKurz, Manager at Aspen Deli, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to review our shop!  We are happy that you enjoyed your sandwiches for your day at the grand canyon and look forward to the opportunity to serve you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good sandwiches
data.text:
Good food, a little pricier than expected. 
Parking a bit tricky.
On a one way street so you need to have a good sense of direction.

owner_response.author: JennKurz, Manager at Aspen Deli, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to review our shop.  We agree that parking can be a little tricky.  We share a lot with the Orpheum theater and they tend to block it if they have a concert that evening.  There is a public parking lot directly across the street from us that can sometimes fill up and so locating street parking is sometimes required. but we feel that if you find a spot you will find that it was worth the struggle and appreciate that you took the extra time to find a place to park.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good sandwich - tough to park
data.text: Stopped in this week to try the place out and it was a very good sandwich.  Parking was very difficult, so if you can walk here from somewhere nearby with parking, do it.  I tried the turkey cranberry sandwich.  It was great with the turkey and cranberry cream stuffed into a hoagie roll.  Then the crispy bacon gave it good texture with a bit of crunch.  I had planned to eat half the sandwich and save the rest, but it all disappeared as I just kept going.  Will find my way back there to try another on the list.

owner_response.author: JennKurz, Owner at Aspen Deli, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Brandon,
Thank you for finding a parking spot and giving us a try.  We agree that parking can be a challenge.  If the Orpheum closes the lot along side our shop there is a small public parking lot across the street that you can try, though it does fill up on busy downtown days.  Otherwise you would probably need to go around the block and find some street parking but we promise the sandwich you receive once you find parking will be worth the effort and we are happy you agree with that Brandon! :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Sandwiches Worth Eating!
data.text: I have pretty high standards for pastrami, and Aspen Deli's sandwich makes my mouth water just thinking about it.  I also love the Jersey Girl, especially on sourdough.  They can get busy, so it's helpful to call first, but don't miss this little gem of downtown Flagstaff, and it they offer some soup on the side, say yes!

owner_response.author: JennKurz, Owner at Aspen Deli, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about us.  We work very hard to ensure that the best possible meats are served and we are so happy that you appreciate that and enjoyed your meal!  We look forward to serving you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great sandwiches
data.text:
The star of the show here, in my opinion, is the Cuban sandwich.  Wow, what a tasty sandwich.  I wish I had ordered two!  The Jersey Girl sandwich was very good also.  We had a side of the pasta salad and liked it a lot.

They make every sandwich fresh, so it might take a little while to get your order, but it's definitely worth it.

owner_response.author: JennKurz, Owner at Aspen Deli, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi Larry,  Thank you for taking the time to review our deli.  We are happy you enjoyed your sandwiches and hope to have the opportunity to serve you again. soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Oh, my, what a sandwich!
data.text: So glad we found this awesome little deli, just off Route 66. Yummy, large sandwiches and so friendly staff. You have to stop here when you are looking for a great sandwich.

owner_response.author: JennKurz, Owner at Aspen Deli, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Sondra,
Thank you so much for stopping in to eat and for your review.  We appreciate you and your business!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wowser!!
data.text:
Stopped here for lunch on a friend's recommendation. It was worth it! I had an amazing Reuben, my wife-turkey wrap. Also the spinach salad, with bleu cheese crumbles-exotic flavors. 

The Aspen Deli is on our "return again " list.

owner_response.author: JennKurz, Owner at Aspen Deli, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi!  Thank you so much for giving our little place a try.  We are so happy you enjoyed your meal and look forward to serving you again in the future!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Decent and Quick
data.text: We stopped in the Deli on the way out of town. The food was good but nothing to write home about. The staff was friendly and our food was brought out in a timely manner.

owner_response.author: JennKurz, Owner at Aspen Deli, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your experience.  We are happy you enjoyed your meal and hope you had safe travels to wherever you were headed!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great place!
data.text: This place is great - the Reuben sandwich was fantastic. The owner is friendly and gave us great suggestions for our trip to Grand Canyon. Go visit - you won't be disappointed.

data.title: ~ Sandwiches made with pride.
data.text: ~  Asked the counter Gal to put our sandwich condiments on the side as we were going on a drive/picnic.  She and the sandwich maker perfectly prepared our Aspen Club and New Yorker sandwiches to go along with Tomato Basil Soup and a Gigantic Dill Pickle. Very quick and friendly service. Thanks.

data.title: Almost Excellent
data.text: Very good "Aspen Club" club sandwich which could have the best with a decent amount of turkey on it.  Small place. Service a little slow even 'tho not especially crowded. They seemed to be struggling with non-cash "payment technology.  I'd go back. Three minute walk from train station; 5 from library.

owner_response.author: JennKurz, Owner at Aspen Deli, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback!  We appreciate your feedback and hope you come back and visit us again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: My favorite sandwich place in Flagstaff
data.text: I love, love this sandwich place. It's a little cramped and can get busy during lunch hour, but it is so worth the wait. We order to go, if its busy. I love their turkey!
